column2: Formulate an ontology related to cost. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/ontology/cost#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .:Cost a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Cost" ;    rdfs:comment "A monetary or other value required to acquire, produce, accomplish, or maintain something." .:FixedCost a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Cost ;    rdfs:label "Fixed Cost" ;    rdfs:comment "A cost that does not change with an increase or decrease in the amount of goods or services produced." .:VariableCost a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Cost ;    rdfs:label "Variable Cost" ;    rdfs:comment "A cost that varies with the level of output." .:SemiVariableCost a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Cost ;    rdfs:label "Semi-Variable Cost" ;    rdfs:comment "A cost composed of a mixture of fixed and variable components." .:DirectCost a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Cost ;    rdfs:label "Direct Cost" ;    rdfs:comment "A cost that can be directly attributed to a specific product or activity." .:IndirectCost a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Cost ;    rdfs:label "Indirect Cost" ;    rdfs:comment "A cost that cannot be directly attributed to a specific product or activity." .:hasAmount a rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :Cost ;    rdfs:range xsd:decimal ;    rdfs:label "has amount" ;    rdfs:comment "The monetary value of the cost." .:hasCurrency a rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :Cost ;    rdfs:range xsd:string ;    rdfs:label "has currency" ;    rdfs:comment "The currency in which the cost is measured." .:hasCostType a rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain :Cost ;    rdfs:range :Cost ;    rdfs:label "has cost type" ;    rdfs:comment "The classification of the cost as fixed, variable, etc." .```

column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: cost. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/cost#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .:Cost rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Cost" ;    rdfs:comment "A concept representing the expenditure associated with a resource or process." .:FixedCost rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Cost ;    rdfs:label "Fixed Cost" ;    rdfs:comment "A cost that does not change with an increase or decrease in the amount of goods or services produced." .:VariableCost rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Cost ;    rdfs:label "Variable Cost" ;    rdfs:comment "A cost that varies with the level of output." .:SunkCost rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Cost ;    rdfs:label "Sunk Cost" ;    rdfs:comment "A cost that has already been incurred and cannot be recovered." .:DirectCost rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Cost ;    rdfs:label "Direct Cost" ;    rdfs:comment "A cost that can be directly attributed to a specific cost object." .:IndirectCost rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Cost ;    rdfs:label "Indirect Cost" ;    rdfs:comment "A cost that cannot be directly attributed to a specific cost object and is instead allocated among multiple cost objects." .:hasValue rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Cost ;    rdfs:range xsd:decimal ;    rdfs:label "has value" ;    rdfs:comment "Links a cost to its monetary value." .:incurs rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Cost ;    rdfs:range :Entity ;    rdfs:label "incurs" ;    rdfs:comment "Represents the relationship of an entity incurring a cost." .:Entity rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Entity" ;    rdfs:comment "A general concept representing any individual, organization, or process that might incur costs." .:hasCost rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Entity ;    rdfs:range :Cost ;    rdfs:label "has cost" ;    rdfs:comment "Indicates that an entity has an associated cost." .```

column2: Design an ontology to encompass the following: cost.   Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/cost#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .:Cost rdf:type rdfs:Class ;      rdfs:label "Cost" ;      rdfs:comment "A class representing the notion of cost." .:hasAmount rdf:type rdf:Property ;           rdfs:domain :Cost ;           rdfs:range xsd:decimal ;           rdfs:label "has amount" ;           rdfs:comment "Defines the monetary amount of a cost." .:hasCurrency rdf:type rdf:Property ;             rdfs:domain :Cost ;             rdfs:range rdfs:Literal ;             rdfs:label "has currency" ;             rdfs:comment "Defines the currency in which the cost is specified." .:hasDate rdf:type rdf:Property ;         rdfs:domain :Cost ;         rdfs:range xsd:date ;         rdfs:label "has date" ;         rdfs:comment "Defines the date associated with the cost." .:isFixedCost rdf:type rdf:Property ;             rdfs:domain :Cost ;             rdfs:range xsd:boolean ;             rdfs:label "is fixed cost" ;             rdfs:comment "Indicates if the cost is fixed or variable." .:isRecurringCost rdf:type rdf:Property ;                 rdfs:domain :Cost ;                 rdfs:range xsd:boolean ;                 rdfs:label "is recurring cost" ;                 rdfs:comment "Indicates if the cost is recurring." .:CostCategory rdf:type rdfs:Class ;              rdfs:label "Cost Category" ;              rdfs:comment "A category to which a cost belongs." .:belongsToCategory rdf:type rdf:Property ;                   rdfs:domain :Cost ;                   rdfs:range :CostCategory ;                   rdfs:label "belongs to category" ;                   rdfs:comment "Specifies the category under which the cost is classified." .```
